price: “Yoo kan dhugaa dubbattan taataniif, waadaan kun yoom? jedhu.
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلۡوَعۡدُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna matā hādhā al-waʿdu in kuntum ṣādiqīna
